test.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? [1, 2, 3] : [4, 5])
SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? [1, 2, 3] : materialize([4, 5]))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? materialize([1, 2, 3]) : materialize([4, 5]))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? [1, 2, 3] : [400, 500])
SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? [1, 2, 3] : materialize([400, 500]))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(10000000) WHERE NOT ignore(rand() % 2 ? materialize([1, 2, 3]) : materialize([400, 500]))
